title: Episode 348 - Taking ZK IRL with Cursive

rawLines.text: [Music]
welcome to zero knowledge I'm your host
Anna Rose in this podcast we will be
exploring the latest in zero knowledge
research and the decentralized web as
well as new paradigms that promise to
change the way we interact and transact
[Music]
online this week Nico and I chat with
Andrew and Vivic from cursive we catch
up with them about what led them to
start working on a series of activations
and experiments using programmable
cryptography we map out the timeline of

and I have actually mentioned these

great to get a chance to catch up with

in detail but we are looking to launch a

want to mention that zik hack Soul has

able to secure the venue that we needed
and so we've decided not to do the event

now here's our episode with Andrew and

what goes on here is like uh in this

me and inro are doing a private set
intersection we essentially like
together perform an initial MPC where we
create like a shared public key so
between us we can see the public key but
we neither of us knows the corresponding
private key it's kind of like a split
between us and so with this public key
what we can do is we can encrypt our
